titleStmt.title: Copy of a Loan of Money
titleStmt.author: Pakysis son of Petenouphis

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Copy of agreement. Year 13 <or 16> of the Emperor Caesar Nerva [Trajan] Augustus Germanicus Dacicus, month Sebastos 25, in Ptolemais Euergetis of the Arsinoite nome. Pakysis, son of Petenouphis, Persian of the epigone, about 20 years old, with a scar on his left forearm, acknowledges to Tattion(?), daughter of Saturnilus, about 35 years old, with a scar on her left knee, having as her guardian her kinsman Sotas, son of Petenouris, about 40 years old, with a scar on his right knee, that he has received from her herewith in cash four hundred drachmai in silver . . . [- - - ].

listBibl.bibl: Youtie LC, ZPE 37, 203-205, 1980, Pl. Vb -- SB XVI 12611 -- BL IX, 287 (l. 1, date)
